name: Mike Dean
information: Best known for recording and mixing songs and synthesizers for major artists across the American hip hop industry such as Kanye West, Kid Cudi, 2Pac, Scarface, Travis Scott, 2 Chainz, Jay-Z, Desiigner, Drake, Madonna, and The Weeknd.
